original_text: but if the sun has risen on him, there shall be bloodguilt for him. He shall surely pay. If he has nothing, then he shall be sold for his theft.
korean_text: 해 돋은 후에는 피 흘린 죄가 있으리라 도둑은 반드시 배상할 것이나 배상할 것이 없으면 그 몸을 팔아 그 도둑질한 것을 배상할 것이요

sentences.original_text: but if the sun has risen on him
there shall be bloodguilt for him
then he shall be sold for his theft
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 도둑질 때문에 팔려야 할 것이다
